column1: interesting twist on the vampire yarn fast loud and moody despite my initial fears kris k carries his part reasonably well and snipes aka blade provides a <UNK> physical presence lots of blood steel silver burning and exploding bodies provide an enjoyable <UNK> minute distraction if you like the black look of the matrix then blade will appeal to you blade even has a the sequence
